Body: So I went to download a large game (1GB). It started downloading, and at 96% it stopped and said I don't have enough memory.I wont try to download it again, but that 96% that I downloaded is still in my phone and I cant delete it. Can someone tell me how? I went into options then applications, but there is no that game that I can delete. I tried to find it many times but it is not there.
Title: Downloading game memoryp roblem

history.Text: So i went to download a game(1GB) it started downloading and on 96 % i stoped and it says i dont have enough memory so ok i wont try to download it again but that 95 % that i downloaded are still in my phone and i cant delete it? can someone tell me how? i went into options then applications but there is no that game that i want to delete i tried to find it about 100 times but it is not there

So I went to download a large game (1GB). It started downloading, and at 96% it stopped and said I don't have enough memory.I wont try to download it again, but that 96% that I downloaded is still in my phone and I cant delete it. Can someone tell me how? I went into options then applications, but there is no that game that I can delete. I tried to find it many times but it is not there.
